front.title: •Only Jedi Carry That Weapon
front.gametext: Plays on table. For opponent to steal a weapon from target character using a non-[Episode I] card, must first draw destiny. If destiny +1 > target's ability, weapon stolen. Otherwise, attempt fails and stealing card is placed out of play.
front.lore: An elegant weapon for a more civilized age.

counterpart: Weapon Of A Sith - Defensive Shield
